posts.post_content:
Does quite a convincing [Plasma Elemental](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Plasma Elemental) impression.  
  
2 per turn with shadow + vigilance is also pretty good. Leaves you with a 3/3 double-striking blocker, or even a pro-red one.  
  
Combos with any kind of pump.  
  
Interestingly, there IS one color that gets [all](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?multiverseid=145973) [of](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?multiverseid=108856) [these](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?multiverseid=108856) [abilities](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?multiverseid=246949), but it's not Blue...
posts.html:
Does quite a convincing Plasma Elemental impression.
